channel.title: More-infos on Scott Larson

item.title: Remote Backup System Management Service Details
item.description: Remote Backup Management is a service I provide to you that decreases risk of data loss. I provide this service under a recurring fee specified in the System Management Package. Depending on the package you purchased. This service fee includes subscription licensing fees for software I install on your device to protect your device from disasters, from security threats, and my time to maintain this service on a recurring basis.
